quote: ...in the end it's not just the big and small events that make you who you are, make your life what it is, it's how you choose to react to them-that's where you have control over your life.
quote_letters: IN THE END ITS NOT JUST THE BIG AND SMALL EVENTS THAT MAKE YOU WHO YOU ARE MAKE YOUR LIFE WHAT IT IS ITS HOW YOU CHOOSE TO REACT TO THEM-THATS WHERE YOU HAVE CONTROL OVER YOUR LIFE
